List of Stops

If GPS is enabled, this screen shows the stops closest to you, else it shows the stops you have viewed most often. Tap a stop to show the next arrivals for all routes at the stop.

Searching

Enter text or numbers to search for a stop. If the search is only digits, it matches both stop numbers (on the blue signs) and stops containing numbers (e.g. \"1102 Jalna NB\"). If there are any non-digits, it just matches stop names.

Case is ignored, and multiple, partial words work. For example to find stops at Dundas and Richmond, try \"dun rich\".
